flags.title: Request Guide Deletion
flags.text: This guide will be reviewed by admins for deletion.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The TurtleBot mobile robot is designed for both academic and hobbyiest researchers. The open source hardware design provides excellent documentation for adding modifications and extending the capabilities of the robot in hardware or software. The robot is available to purchase as a kit or if your research budget is limited, this guide will help you build your own.
guide.introduction_rendered: The TurtleBot mobile robot is designed for both academic and hobbyiest researchers. The open source hardware design provides excellent documentation for adding modifications and extending the capabilities of the robot in hardware or software. The robot is available to purchase as a kit or if your research budget is limited, this guide will help you build your own.
guide.summary: This guide shows you how to build your own TurtleBot mobile robot.
guide.title: Build Your Own TurtleBot
